name: The return of the mad crab (kebek)
name_original: The return of the mad crab (kebek)
description:
game inspired by the classic free way of the atari 2600 with references to TV commercials from the 80's, 90's.

The game consists of guiding the crab across the road to the bathers, dodging cars, bicycles, motorcycles and other possible obstacles, collecting the beer cans that will appear and returning to the den,

repeating this action until the cooler counter is zero before the time runs out to advance to the next stage.
